description: Due to a lack of budget, the Yorozuya try to use old footage to make a filler episodes. While Hasegawa first plays a theme song, the characters then watch a fake trailer a supposed second film based on the series. The episode ends with a chapter of "Teach us Ginpachi-sensei", a story in which Gintoki is the teacher from high school class composed of anime`s characters.

titles.title: Itsumademo Aru to Omou na, Oya to Kane to Wakasa to Heya to Y-shirt to Watashi to Anata to Anime Gintama
Nothing Lasts Forever, Including Parents, Money, Youth, Your Room, Dress Shirts, Me, You, and the Gintama Anime
いつまでもあると思うな親と金と若さと部屋とYシャツと私とあなたとアニメ銀魂
